title: Budget Tracker
description: A simple webapp to manage your income and expense. Import/Export the transactions as CSV. Deployed on Firebase Hosting via CI/CD using Github Actions

title: SnipShot
description: A small blogging platform that perform all the CRUD application. Users can login and perform CRUD operation on their Blogs

title: UI for Shoe Store
description: A modern, responsive landing page for a shoe store designed with clean UI and smooth navigation. Showcases featured products, highlights brand identity, and is optimized for both desktop and mobile devices.

title: Social Hub
description: A platform where users can join different communities and share thoughts, activities etc. Similar to any social media

title: Dev Book
description: A platform where develpoers can maintain their professional profile, just like a resume. User can also post mini blogs.

title: Library Management
description: A web based solution to manage library operations. Also user can see book's details without visiting library.
